net.sf.wubiq.android

Class ImageToEscaped

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.android.BaseImageConversion
      • net.sf.wubiq.android.ImageToEscaped

  • public class ImageToEscaped
extends BaseImageConversion
    Converts an image into a escaped sequence. Compatible with Star Micronics, Porti-S and most generic printers.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
